segments.text: I see the boy stretching as high as he can to reach the cookie jar, he's really determined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's standing on a stool that looks like it's about to tip over, that's dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the girl standing nearby, looking up at him with her hand out, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they're trying to be quiet so the woman doesn't hear them, but they're not being very subtle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've done this before, they seem to know what they're doing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just a few feet away, but she's completely unaware of what's going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the stool wobbling as the boy tries to balance himself, he could really fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they might be in trouble if the woman catches them, she might get angry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't hurt themselves trying to get those cookies, it's not worth it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how focused they are on getting those cookies, they're not paying attention to anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the cookies are worth the risk, they might get in trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR
